content: rnd14 decrease 6x 6 sts fo with about 6 inch tail end with needle and tail sew in flo of last 6 sts cinch hole closed secure and hide end inside head pony ears worked top down make 2 rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 5 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 5 in ml 5 sts rnd2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 sts rnd3 increase single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 6 sts rnd4 increase single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 7 sts rnd5 increase single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 8 sts fo with tail for sewing to head pinch flat leave end open do not stuff pony fore legs worked from bottom up make 2 rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 in blo single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts rnd4 in both loops single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 11 sts rnd5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 sts rnd6 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 10 sts rnd7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 sts stuff the leg so far and continue stuffing as you go rnd8 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 9 sts rnd9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 9 sts rnd10 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 8 sts rnd11-13 3 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 sts fo with tail for sewing to body pony hind legs worked from bottom up make 2 rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 in blo single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts rnd4 in both loops single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 11 sts rnd5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 sts rnd6 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 10 sts rnd7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 sts stuff the leg so far and continue stuffing every few rounds rnd8 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 9 sts rnd9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 9 sts rnd10 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 8 sts rnd11 single_crochet in next single_crochet increase 2x single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease 2x 8 sts rnd12 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase 2x single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease 9 sts rnd13 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease 2x single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase 8 sts rnd14 increase single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease slip_stitch in next single_crochet do not finish round fo with tail for sewing to body pony body worked from front to back rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 increase single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 6x 18
